categories.title: New Features
list: Initial release

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed resetting all tabs

categories.title: New Features
list: Added overlay opacity slider
Added colour opacity slider

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Checkbox containers are now labels

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed missing pointer cursors
Fixed debug mode duplicating textures
Fixed plugin about action not getting removed on plugin unload
Fixed anchor links in Blockbench webapp
Fixed gradient overlay scaling

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed for Safari versions older than version 16.4

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed the "V" character in the built-in font

categories.title: Changes
list: Tweak the "Small" text size

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Fonts can now change the example text

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Optimise the models in the built-in font

categories.title: New Features
list: Added new Minecraft Title texture preset export options

categories.title: Changes
list: The plugin now has an image icon
The Minecraft Title angle is now automatically loaded on project creation

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Update to new plugin repository format

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: The built-in font and overlay will now have a working thumbnail when there is no internet connection

categories.title: Changes
list: Added a warning when there is no internet connection

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Switch to jsDelivr CDN

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: The built-in font and overlay will now have a working thumbnail when there is no internet connection

categories.title: New Features
list: Added font variants

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Added CDN url fallback system
Font variants are a breaking change so the sources have been moved to a temporary dev branch

categories.title: Changes
list: Switch back to main branch

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Aspect ratio calculation fix

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed fonts that are flat

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Blockbench will now wait for Minecraft Title Generator to load before finishing loading

categories.title: Changes
list: Fonts can now list their available characters
Font variants now have their own tab
Added more info button on fonts
Fonts can now have descriptions
Increased max font list height

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Removed font "width" property

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed debug mode thumbnails

categories.title: New Features
list: Added "Tileables". Tileables are a texture type that tiles a texture over the faces of each character
Added new render output Dialog with more customisation options

categories.title: Changes
list: Added required EULA agreement
Added confirmation check for deleting presets
Updated number sliders to use Blockbench numeric inputs
Font and texture thumbnails now lazy load

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed backup CDN for if a CDN goes down after you have opened Blockbench and used the plugin

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed ability to bypass EULA agreement

categories.title: Changes
list: Made the position camera button a main button with a new icon
Render buttons now have tooltips

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed render controls disappearing for some people
Fixed render controls missing in Blockbench v4.10.0

categories.title: Technical Changes
list: Added a class to the format page so it can be easily targetted by themes

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed Vue.js warnings

categories.title: Changes
list: The texture search bar can now be cleared with a button
The texture search bar will now be automatically focused when switching tab
Added the ability to remove the custom overlay texture

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed resetting the font selection page
Fixed resetting texture and overlay pages when a custom texture is loaded

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed selected items to use the select colour instead of the button colour

categories.title: Changes
list: Fonts now support setting a default character spacing

categories.title: New Features
list: Fonts now support character shifting. This adjusts the spacing between specific characters to improve readability by slightly modifying their positions when placed next to each other
Fonts now support custom widths for the spaces between words
Added the ability to disable the built-in overlay texture included with some fonts. These are normally only applied when using gradient or tileable textures

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed built-in font overlay textures using the wrong blend method
Fixed some settings possibly not loading properly when loading a preset

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed enabling line terminators causing a crash

categories.title: New Features
list: Added "Shapes". Shapes are a new type of element that can be added, as an alternative to text/fonts
"Minecraft Title" is now available as an angle from the "Angles" context menu

categories.title: Changes
list: Textures are now upscaled to the maximum size when enabling the fade edges to the border colour feature, in order to make a smoother gradient
Fade edges to the border colour is now automatically selected when selecting the bottom text type
Words with only one character will no longer contain a subgroup for that character
Tileable texture resolution is now 1-4 instead of 1000-4000
Improved the loading time of the plugin dialogs first load
Redesigned the presets menu

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed loading presets with font variants
Fixed being unable to create presets when one already exists

categories.title: Bug Fixes
list: Fixed presets not loading all settings properly
